mapper.insert:
insert into VINUX_DESIGN_PAGE_DATA
ID,
PAGE_ID,
CDATE,
_VERSION,
DATA,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update VINUX_DESIGN_PAGE_DATA
PAGE_ID = #{pageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CDATE = #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
_VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DATA = #{data,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from VINUX_DESIGN_PAGE_DATA WHERE ID = (SELECT MIN(ID) from VINUX_DESIGN_PAGE_DATA WHERE PAGE_ID = #{pageId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
select count(1) from VINUX_DESIGN_PAGE_DATA WHERE PAGE_ID = #{pageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
